title: 87/584/EEC: Commission Decision of 30 November 1987 approving a programme for the seed potato sector in Belgium pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 (Only the French and Dutch texts are authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 30 November 1987
approving a programme for the seed potato sector in Belgium pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77
(Only the French and the Dutch texts are authentic)
(87/584/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The programme for the seed potatoes forwarded by the Belgian Goverment on 24 November 1986, pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 355/77, and concerning which additional information was supplied on 1 June 1987, is hereby approved.
This Decision is addressed to Belgium.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 November 1987.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 51, 23. 2. 1977, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 57, 27. 2. 1987, p. 6.
